Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: Stakeholders posts on the upcoming budget with calls for disadvantaged groups including those seeking asylum to receive adequate income support. However others are questioning the allocation of funds for AUKUS submarines in light of recent welfare reports. ACOSS shares an article by Ben Phillips on the upcoming budget and urges the government to #RaiseTheRate highlighting the importance of aiding financially vulnerable citizens. While opinions differ online these posts highlight the concerns of everyday Australians who are voicing their beliefs on current political issues.
